title: Large Edwardian one bedroom for rent
posting_body: Cross Streets at Bush and Powell Awesome location!
You will find this neighborhood has EVERYTHING.
Walking distance to the financial district, Theatre District and the Union Square Shopping District are just two blocks down the hill.
North beach is a short ten-minute walk through Chinatown which itself is just two blocks away to the east.
North two blocks is the Fairmont and Mark Hopkins Hotels and Huntington Park (very top of Nob Hill).
Walk to the West and you will find Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, and the Polk Gulch neighborhood.
The Farmers Market at the Crocker Galleria at Sutter between Kearny and Montgomery is a great nearby opportunity for the freshest local produce.
This area has endless dining out entertainment options.

“This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.”
